Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute Exponential modulation

computeModulation(time, riseTime, levelTime, maxTime) time = the time value for which the modulation function is computed riseTime = it is the instant of time (in sec) corresponding to the beginning of the horizontal part of the envelope levelTime = it is the instant of time corresponding to the beginning of the descending branch of the envelope. The Level Time should be larger than the Rise Time. maxTime = the maximum time of the envelope
